Rules.InvariantScript:
If(
    IsBlankOrError(locWOCount),
    T.MaintenanceWorkOrdersExistingLabel,
    Substitute(
        T.MaintenanceWorkOrdersExistingCountLabel,
        "{ExistingWorkOrdersCount}",
        If(
            locWOCount > 99,
            "99+",
            locWOCount
        )
    )
)

If(
    IsBlankOrError(locMRCount),
    T.MaintenanceRequestsExistingLabel,
    Substitute(
        T.MaintenanceRequestsExistingCountLabel,
        "{ExistingRequestsCount}",
        If(
            locMRCount > 99,
            "99+",
            locMRCount
        )
    )
)

CustomProperties.Name: textFontSize
CustomProperties.Tooltip: The font size of the label

CustomProperties.Name: DefaultText
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Default text to set in the input field.

CustomProperties.Name: HorizontalPadding
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Left and Right padding for Text input and label.

Rules.InvariantScript: Filter('Work Order Service Levels', 'Company Code' = locAsset.'Company Code')

Filter(
    'Asset management work order types (mserp)',
    'Company Code' = locAsset.'Company Code'
)

Filter(
    'Asset management maintenance job types (mserp)',
    'Company Code' = locAsset.'Company Code'
)
Search(Filter('Asset management maintenance job types (mserp)','Company Code'=locAsset.'Company Code'),drpNewWorkOrderJobType.SearchText,mserp_name)

Filter(
    'Asset management maintenance job type variants (mserp)',
    'Company Code' = locAsset.'Company Code',
    'Maintenance job type' = drpNewWorkOrderJobType.Selected.Name
)
